comment: розовый ужас сделанный из Риззы, бегает по каюте капитана

languages.text: "Почтеннейш{mf|ий|ая}, клянусь, мои ребятки тебе что угодно из варпа достанут! Всего-то и надо, что разок отключить поле Геллера при следующем перелете!"

traits.locale_text: "Почтеннейш{mf|ий|ая}, клянусь, мои ребятки тебе что угодно из варпа достанут! Всего-то и надо, что разок отключить поле Геллера при следующем перелете!"

languages.text: "I swear to you, Honourable One, my boys can get anything you need from the warp! We just need to turn off the Geller field for a moment during the next flight!"
languages.original_text: "Почтеннейш{mf|ий|ая}, клянусь, мои ребятки тебе что угодно из варпа достанут! Всего-то и надо, что разок отключить поле Геллера при следующем перелете!"

traits.locale_text: "I swear to your esteemed self, my boys will fish out anything you need from the warp! We just need the Gellar Field to be turned off for a moment during the next flight!"
"I swear to your esteemed self, my boys will fish out anything you need from the warp! We just need the Gellar Field to be turned off for a moment during the next flight!"
"I swear to you, Honourable One, my boys can get anything you need from the warp! We just need to turn off the Geller Field for a moment during the next flight!"
"I swear to you, Honourable One, my boys can get anything you need from the warp! We just need to turn off the Geller Field for a moment during the next flight!"
"I swear to you, Honourable One, my boys can get anything you need from the warp! We just need to turn off the Geller field for a moment during the next flight!"

languages.text: “我向您发誓，尊贵的大人。无论您想要什么，我都可以从亚空间中弄到！只要在下次飞行的过程中，暂时关掉盖勒力场就行了！”
languages.original_text: "I swear to you, Honourable One, my boys can get anything you need from the warp! We just need to turn off the Geller field for a moment during the next flight!"

traits.locale_text: “我向您发誓，尊贵的大人。无论您想要什么，我都可以从亚空间中弄到！只要在下次飞行的过程中，暂时关掉盖勒力场就行了！”

languages.text: « Je vous le promets, honorable {mf|sire|dame}, mes hommes peuvent vous obtenir tout ce dont vous avez besoin dans le Warp ! Il suffira de désactiver le champ de Geller durant quelques instants lors de notre prochain voyage ! »
languages.original_text: "I swear to you, Honourable One, my boys can get anything you need from the warp! We just need to turn off the Geller field for a moment during the next flight!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous le promets, honorable {mf|sire|dame}, mes hommes peuvent vous obtenir tout ce dont vous avez besoin dans le Warp ! Il suffira de désactiver le champ de Geller durant quelques instants lors de notre prochain voyage ! »

languages.text: 「誉れ高き者よ、歪みで必要なものならなんでも私の仲間たちが手に入れると約束するよ！次に飛ぶ時は、ちょっとの間ゲラーフィールドを切っておかないとね！」
languages.original_text: "I swear to you, Honourable One, my boys can get anything you need from the warp! We just need to turn off the Geller field for a moment during the next flight!"

traits.locale_text: 「誉れ高き者よ、歪みで必要なものならなんでも私の仲間たちが手に入れると約束するよ！次に飛ぶ時は、ちょっとの間ゲラーフィールドを切っておかないとね！」

languages.text: «Os lo juro, oh, honorable, ¡mis muchachos pueden sacar cualquier cosa que necesite de la disformidad! ¡Solo necesitamos desconectar el campo de Geller por un momento en el siguiente vuelo!».
languages.original_text: "I swear to you, Honourable One, my boys can get anything you need from the warp! We just need to turn off the Geller field for a moment during the next flight!"

traits.locale_text: «Os lo juro, oh, honorable, ¡mis muchachos pueden sacar cualquier cosa que necesite de la disformidad! ¡Solo necesitamos desconectar el campo de Geller por un momento en el siguiente vuelo!».

languages.text: "Ich schwöre Euch, {mf|Ehrenwertester|Ehrenwerteste}, meine Jungs können Euch alles aus dem Warp beschaffen! Wir müssen nur während des nächsten Flugs kurz das Gellerfeld ausschalten!"
languages.original_text: "I swear to you, Honourable One, my boys can get anything you need from the warp! We just need to turn off the Geller field for a moment during the next flight!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich schwöre Euch, {mf|Ehrenwertester|Ehrenwerteste}, meine Jungs können Euch alles aus dem Warp beschaffen! Wir müssen nur während des nächsten Flugs kurz das Gellerfeld ausschalten!"

languages.text: "Saygıdeğer {mf|Beyefendi|Hanımefendi}, öteboyuttan ne isterseniz benim oğlanlar bulup getirir! Bir sonraki uçuşta Geller alanını azıcık kapatmamız kâfi!"
languages.original_text: "I swear to you, Honourable One, my boys can get anything you need from the warp! We just need to turn off the Geller field for a moment during the next flight!"
